caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–3 .
Xizicus ( Xizicus ) fascipes ( Bey-Bienko, 1955 )
. 1 . Male pronotum and head, dorsal view; 2 . Tip of male abdomen, dorsal view; 3 . Tip of male abdomen, lateral view (half of the single process shown, circular region is the area where two parts pressing against each other).
